children.text: Insert information of the player you'd like to add below

children.onClick: {{Post_New_Player.run(() => showAlert('Successfully posted a new player','success'), () => showAlert('Could not post a new player','error'))}}

children.label: enter either: pg, sg, sf, pf, c

children.text: Provide the player id of the player you'd like to delete

children.onClick: {{Delete_Player.run(() => showAlert('Player deleted','success'), () => showAlert('Unable to delete given player','error'))}}

children.text: Provide the player id of the player you'd like to edit

children.onClick: {{get_players_to_edit.run(() => showAlert('Successfully retrieved data','success'), () => showAlert('Provide a valid player id','error'))}}
